primeAdvantages.name: Combat Veterans
primeAdvantages.description: The unit has seen extensive combat and is hardened by experience
primeAdvantages.effect: The unit gains +1 Leadership and may re-roll failed Morale checks

primeAdvantages.name: Master Sergeant
primeAdvantages.description: The unit is led by an exceptional sergeant
primeAdvantages.effect: The unit's sergeant gains +1 Attack and +1 Leadership

primeAdvantages.name: Logistical Benefit
primeAdvantages.description: The unit has excellent logistical support
primeAdvantages.effect: Add one Battlefield Role slot of your choice to the detachment
restrictions: Cannot add slots that would exceed detachment limits

primeAdvantages.name: Advanced Characteristics
primeAdvantages.description: The unit has been enhanced beyond normal standards
primeAdvantages.effect: The unit gains +1 to one of its characteristics (WS, BS, S, T, W, I, A, Ld, Sv)

primeAdvantages.name: Specialist Training
primeAdvantages.description: The unit has received specialized training
primeAdvantages.effect: The unit gains a special rule of your choice from a predefined list

primeAdvantages.name: Elite Equipment
primeAdvantages.description: The unit has been equipped with the finest wargear
primeAdvantages.effect: The unit gains +1 to its armour save

primeAdvantages.name: Tactical Expertise
primeAdvantages.description: The unit has exceptional tactical acumen
primeAdvantages.effect: The unit may re-roll one failed roll per turn
restrictions: Only available for High Command units

primeAdvantages.name: Veteran Leadership
primeAdvantages.description: The unit is led by a veteran officer
primeAdvantages.effect: The unit gains the Fearless special rule

primeAdvantages.name: Enhanced Communications
primeAdvantages.description: The unit has superior communication systems
primeAdvantages.effect: The unit may use Command Benefits from friendly units within 12"
restrictions: Only available for units with vox equipment

primeAdvantages.name: Combat Readiness
primeAdvantages.description: The unit is always prepared for battle
primeAdvantages.effect: The unit may re-roll failed Reserve rolls
restrictions: Only available for units that can be placed in Reserve
